companyInfo.name: Shenzhen Lianjin Optoelectronics Co., Ltd.

address.streetAddress: Building A, LED Technology Park, Nanshan District

categories.name: Fine Pitch LED Display
categories.description: Ultra-high resolution LED displays with pixel pitch from 0.9mm to 2.5mm, perfect for control rooms, broadcast studios, and premium indoor applications.
categories.keywords: fine pitch LED, small pixel pitch, high resolution LED, indoor LED display, control room LED, broadcast LED

categories.name: Outdoor LED Display
categories.description: Weather-resistant LED displays designed for outdoor advertising, sports stadiums, and public information systems with high brightness and IP65 protection.
categories.keywords: outdoor LED display, weatherproof LED, high brightness LED, LED billboard, stadium LED, advertising LED screen

categories.name: Rental LED Display
categories.description: Lightweight, portable LED panels ideal for events, concerts, trade shows, and temporary installations with quick setup and modular design.
categories.keywords: rental LED, portable LED display, event LED screen, concert LED, trade show LED, modular LED panel

categories.name: Transparent LED Display
categories.description: See-through LED displays perfect for retail windows, glass facades, and modern architecture with high transparency and stunning visual effects.
categories.keywords: transparent LED, see-through LED, glass LED display, retail LED window, architectural LED

categories.name: Creative LED Display
categories.description: Flexible and customizable LED displays for unique shapes including curved, cylindrical, spherical, and artistic installations.
categories.keywords: creative LED, flexible LED display, curved LED screen, cylindrical LED, spherical LED, artistic LED installation
